briefTitle: Entertainment Media to Deliver Educational Messages About Mammography in Saudi Arabia
officialTitle: Using Entertainment Media to Deliver Educational Messages About Mammography in Saudi Arabia
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Measure the role of issue involvement in predicting intention to perform breast cancer early screening via mammogram among Saudi females after exposure to EE message.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Saudi Arabian
* female

Exclusion Criteria:

* Females 39 or younger
* females above age 69 years
* females who have had breast cancer
* females that have had risk-reducing bilateral mastectomies
